title: In Step
description: Karma. You reap what you sow, and KANE MARTIN isn’t looking for forgiveness. But the arrival of ABE TYLER in Painted Bay has Kane dreaming of the impossible. The sexy, silver fox choreographer is determined to pull Kane out from the shadows, but Kane’s life is in neat little boxes for a reason.A past he isn’t proud of.A family he’s walked away from.A job he doesn’t deserve.A secret he’s ashamed of.But life’s dance can make for unexpected partners, and learning to trust and keep up with the footwork is the name of the game.Two steps forward, one step back.It takes two to Tango.
author: Jay Hogan
